thread.title: Woman's eye glued shut after eye drops, nail glue mix-up
thread.title_full: Woman's eye glued shut after eye drops, nail glue mix-up - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Woman's eye glued shut after eye drops, nail glue mix-up
text:
LANTANA, FL (WPBF/CNN) - A woman said her eye was accidentally glued shut her after a mix-up with nail glue and eye drops.
Katherine Gaydos said a man was using a leaf blower while she was outside when a piece of debris flew into her eye. She said she screamed for somebody else to get the eye drops out of her purse, and a man grabbed the nail glue instead of the eye drops and poured it into her eye.
She said she called 911 as soon as she felt it burn. The glue immediately sealed her eye shut.
Gaydos went to the doctor, but was initially refused when she couldn't pay for treatment.
Her eye remained glued shut for over a week. After a news story ran about her plight, the doctor called her back and managed to reopen her eye.
Gaydos said the doctor told her she would regain her vision in a few days and her eye would eventually be fine.
Her eye, swollen and painful, was difficult to open after the glue was cleared, but Gaydos said it feels a lot better than when it was glued shut.
Copyright 2015 WPBF via CNN.
